description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Set in a colorful underwater environment, Robofish is a dual-stick shoot ‘em up for all ages. With over a dozen ways to customize a weapon and even more upgrades available, players can create billions of possible weapons! Robofish’s campaign mode contains sixteen levels, and for even more destruction, players can test their custom weapons against an unending onslaught of enemies in survival mode!
